body_html: In general, I am fine with changing Cuda name to more neutral GPU. However, unless we know for sure we don't want to do things different for different GPU platforms, for performance or functionalities, we should start with a "AMDGPU" config and then reuse most of the underlying shared code as much as possible.
body_text: In general, I am fine with changing Cuda name to more neutral GPU. However, unless we know for sure we don't want to do things different for different GPU platforms, for performance or functionalities, we should start with a "AMDGPU" config and then reuse most of the underlying shared code as much as possible.
body: In general, I am fine with changing Cuda name to more neutral GPU. However, unless we know for sure we don't want to do things different for different GPU platforms, for performance or functionalities, we should start with a "AMDGPU" config and then reuse most of the underlying shared code as much as possible.
